COMMENT_TX: $Makeup of rained out game the previous day
replay,9,castn001,DET,gormb901,CHI12,,Y,M,CHA,A $when Ian Kinsler was called safe at 2B, White Sox manager Rich Renteria challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay
replay,2,garca003,CHA,gormb901,CHI12,,Y,M,DET,C $when Avisail Garcia was called safe at 1B, Tigers manager Brad Ausmus challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay
$originally scored as single, changed to E5 on 04-12-2017, making all four runs in inning unearned

replay,7,gimec001,MIN,demud901,CHI12,,N,M,CHA,Q $Chris Gimenez' hit down the LF line was touched by a fan; Eduardo Escobar had scored on the play from 1B but White Sox manager Rich Renteria challenged that ruling; the call was upheld by replay
White Sox pitcher Zach Putnam left the game due to an injured elbow
White Sox left fielder Melky Cabrera left the game due to an injured wrist
replay,7,garca003,CHA,laynj901,CHI12,,Y,M,CHA,A $when Todd Frazier was called out at 2B, White Sox manager Rick Renteria challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay
replay,7,garcl004,CHA,everm901,CHI12,,Y,M,CHA,C $when Leury Garcia was called out at 1B, White Sox manager Rick Renteria challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay
White Sox first baseman Jose Abreu left the game due to an injured hip
replay,2,buxtb001,MIN,laynj901,CHI12,,Y,M,CHA,C $when Byron Buxton was called safe at 1B, White Sox manager Rick Renteria challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay
replay,4,corda001,SDN,vanol901,CHI12,,Y,M,SDN,C $when Allen Cordoba was called out at 1B, Padres manager Andy Green challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay
replay,4,abrej003,CHA,vanol901,CHI12,,N,M,SDN,C $when Jose Abreu was called safe at 1B, Padres manager Andy Green challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay
replay,9,sancc001,CHA,vanol901,CHI12,,N,M,SDN,A $when Tyler Saladino was called safe at HP, Padres manager Andy Green challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay
replay,4,hedga001,SDN,vanol901,CHI12,,N,M,SDN,A $when Wil Myers was called out at 3B, Padres manager Andy Green challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay
replay,2,uptoj001,DET,hallt901,CHI12,,Y,M,DET,A $when Justin Upton was called out at 1B, Tigers manager Brad Ausmus challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay
replay,8,garcl004,CHA,hallt901,CHI12,,N,M,DET,I $when Leury Garcia was ruled to have been hit by a pitch, Tigers manager Brad Ausmus challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay
$Jose Abreu swung and leaned across HP on strike three and was called for interference with the catcher trying to make a throw on a steal attempt
$originally scored as single, changed to E6 on 06-10-2017, which makes his run unearned
Dustin Pedroia left with a sprained left wrist
replay,8,ramih003,BOS,reynj901,CHI12,,N,M,BOS,C $when Hanley Ramirez was called out at 1B, Red Sox manager John Farrell challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay
Orioles first baseman Chris Davis left the game due to an injured side
$originally scored with E8 allowing run to score from 1st with no RBI; error removed and RBI added on 06-13-2017
replay,9,schoj001,BAL,emmep901,CHI12,,N,M,BAL,A $when Jonathan Schoop was called out at 2B, Orioles manager Buck Showalter challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay
ej,garca003,P,emmep901,Checked swing call ej,rentr001,M,emmep901,Checked swing call Avisail Garcia and White Sox Manager Rick Renteria ejected by 1B umpire Paul Emmel
ej,andet001,P,wolfj901,Arguing fair call ej,rentr001,M,wolfj901,Arguing fair call $Tim Anderson and manager Rich Renteria ejected by plate umpire Jim Wolf for arguing that short grounder was foul
$White Sox challenged call at 2nd; call was upheld - out after rounding base too far
$Chad Pinder left with an injured leg
$Jharel Cotton left with an injured hand

ej,frazt001,P,holbs901,Arguing replay ruling ej,rentr001,M,holbs901,Arguing replay ruling $Anderson beat throw to first on close play; White Sox challenged call which was upheld - safe; 3B Frazier got into argument with 3b umpire Holbrook and was ejected; Chicago manager Renteria argued with Wolf and was also ejected
$Athletics challenged call of out at first; call overturned - safe on error
$White Sox Chris Beck left with injured leg
$Yankees challenged call of out at 2nd; call upheld  - batter out at 2nd
$Starlin Castro left with injured leg
ej,rentr001,M,wendh902,Arguing balls and strikes $White Sox manager Rich Renteria ejected for arguing balls and srikes
ej,petrj001,P,wendh902,Arguing balls and strikes Jake Petrikca ejected for arguing balls and strikes
$White Sox Avisail Garcia left with injured knee
$Dustin Fowler crashed into low wall chasing foul ball and ruptured patellar tendon, out for season; this was his Major League debut
$Rangers challenged that double was foul; call was upheld - double
$Rangers challenged call of double play, claiming slide interference; call overturned - forceout, not double play
$Mariners challenged, claiming that Garcia did not touch first base; call was upheld, batter Garcia advances to 2nd

ej,rentr001,M,hallt901,Arguing advance on pickoff throw $White Sox manager Renteria ejected by crew chief Tom Hallion for arguing that on pickoff throw the pitcher had stepped off the rubber, becoming an infielder so when ball went out of play, the runner should have been awarded two bases; umpires said he threw from the rubber, so he was a  pitcher and the advance was properly one base
$Dodgers challenged call that Cabrera returned safely on pickoff attempt; call was overturned - out on pickoff
$Game called for rain
$umpires reviewed call on field that Brantley had homered; call was overturned - double, not homer
$Indians challenged call that Anderson was safe at 1st; call was upheld - first baseman off bag, throwing error
$Josh Tomlin left with injured leg
ej,stevt001,C,barrl901,unknown reason $White Sox hitting coach Todd Steverson ejected by HP umpire Lance Barrett
$White Sox challenged call that Barney's ball was trapped; they claimed it was caught; call was upheld - double
$Blue Jays challenged call that Engel was safe at first; call was upheld - single
$umpires reviewed to be sure Garcia was hit by pitch; call was upheld - hit by pitch
$Matt Davidson left with injured wrist from hit by pitch
$Blue Jays challenged call that Pillar was out attempting to steal; call was upheld - caught stealing
$White Sox challenged call that Montero was safe at 1st; call was overturned - ground out
$originally scored as single, changed to fielder's choice on 08-04-2017
$Miguel Montero left with injured groin
$Blue Jays challenged call that Pillar was out rounding 1st too far; call was overturned - safe at 1st on single
$five-pitch walk
$White Sox challenged call that Garcia was out at second on pickoff aftger 5th pitch to Anderson; call was overturned - pickoff attempt - no out
$Astros challenged call that Garcia was hit by pitch; Call was upheld - hit by pitch
$Royals challenged call that Cain was out attempting to steal 3rd; call was overturned - stolen base
$Royals challenged call that Garcia was safe at 1st; call was overturned - ground out
White Sox challenged call that Escobar was safe at home on wild pitch; call was upheld - safe on wild pitch
$Jason Castro was hit in the mask by multiple foul balls and was placed on the 7-day concussion DL
$Leury Garcia left with injured back
$Yoan Moncada left with injured leg
$White Sox challenged call that Hanson was picked off 2nd after 4th pitch; call was overturned - pickoff attempt - no out
$Tigers challenged call that Engel was safe at first; call upheld - single
ej,ausmb001,M,mahrn901,Arguing balls and strikes $Tiger manager Ausmus complained about called strike on first pitch and was ejected by plate umpire Mahrley
$Tigers challenged call that Abreu wsa safe at home; they claimed he had left third too soon; call was upheld - safe
$Leury Garcia left with injured hand
$Chris Archer left with injured arm

$Rays challenged call that the throw home on Longoria's sacrifice fly went out of play when it skipped past the catcher; they claimed that Souza should have been awarded home; call was upheld - not out of play, runners stays at 3rd
$Indians challenged call tha Lindor was out at 2nd; call was upheld - out stretching
$James Shields left with injured knee
$White Sox challenged call that Perez was sage at 2nd; call was upheld - double
$Yandy Diaz left with injured elbow
$White Sox challenged call that Williamson was safe at 2nd; call wsa overturned - caught stealing
$Posey originally ruled to have scored on a fielder's choice; stolen base was added on 09-12-2017

ej,gioll001,P,morag901,Arguing balls and strikes ej,rentr001,M,coope901,Arguing balls and strikes $Giolito ejected by plate umpire Morales for complaining about balls sna strikes after he was removed from the game; White Sox manager Renteria was on the mound having made the pitching change and continued the argument until he was ejected by crew chief Eric Cooper
$White Sox challenged call that Anderson was out at 3rd; call was upheld - double and out stretching
$orignally scored as single, changed to E5 on 09-27-2017
$White Sox challenged call that Engel was out at 1st; call was upheld - ground out
$Royals challenged call that Hosmer was out at 1st to complete double play; call was overturned - force out, no DP
$Royals challenged call that Cain was out at 2nd; call was upheld - single and out stretching
$Yolmer Sanchez left with injured knee
$Angels challenged call that Phillips was out on fly ball; call was overturned - single
Willy Garcia left with injured leg
